name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 4, Shenyang, Liaoning. A private car crashed into a morning market, which was crowded with people at the time. Many people were injured and fell to the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 4, a clip from the show "This is China" was circulated online. The guest in the video said: The origin of the birth of the US Supreme Court is to restrict and veto the people's right to vote. China's democracy is a full-process democracy, and the people can actively participate in national leadership and governance.
Netizens responded, "Is this track already so hot?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 1, Guangdong. A woman posted a message saying that she works at the Guangdong Taxation Bureau, "If there is a tax boss willing to help me improve, please send me a private message. (Preferably at the department level)" The woman also revealed in the comment section that "my sister passed the national exam with the highest score"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
November 4, Nanchong, Sichuan. The head teacher of Gaoping District Experimental Primary School strongly promoted medical insurance in the parent group: students who did not buy medical insurance would not only be suspended from school, but the school would also hold a meeting for parents.
Local street office: In theory, this is not mandatory, but the higher-ups required it, you know, our street issued a task of more than 20,000.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 4, in Xiangyang, Hubei, an internet celebrity was offering free noodles outdoors. As a result, an old man at the scene cursed at the internet celebrity because he was dissatisfied with the small amount of noodles, and even spilled the noodles on the ground.
Then, an old lady was dissatisfied with the internet celebrity for not giving her a bowl, and also cursed at the scene, "You bastard!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 5 (Released) In the terrorist attack on October 7, 2023, the five Hamas members who killed the German girl Shani Luke and dragged and moved her body have been eliminated.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 5, Shandong. The Shandong branch of China Construction Bank was exposed online for counting visitors’ recent visits to medium- and high-risk areas, whether they had a history of fever within 14 days, and whether their health code was green.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 4 (Released) Chengdu, Sichuan. Urban management officers at Chunxi Road forcibly took away the panda dolls that the vendor was selling, despite his desperate pleas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 1, "positive energy blogger Xiang Ligang" wrote that in the face of a major change that has not happened in a century, I am increasingly convinced that China needs a war to prove itself," which triggered ridicule and boycott by netizens.
Netizens replied, "This guy is too bad. On the one hand, he clamors for war, and on the other hand, he sends his son to the United States."
"Let your son go first"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
This afternoon, Jin Xing's performance in Shanghai was also cancelled.
After the Guangzhou incident, Foshan, Suzhou and Shanghai announced the cancellation of their performances one after another. So far, Jin Xing has no performances scheduled in China this year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 5, Shanghai. A big V forwarded a video about "Mainland tourists freely entering and leaving the Taipei City Government Building". The platform banned him for 15 days on the grounds of "suspected violation of relevant national laws and regulations".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 5 a.m. Eastern Time, Vermont polling stations opened and local residents could begin voting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Washington, the capital, iron fences have been built outside the White House in preparation for the presidential inauguration next January. Businesses around the White House have boarded up their doors and windows to prevent uncontrolled riots after the election.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 4, US presidential candidate Harris went door to door in the swing state of Pennsylvania, canvassing for support.
Netizens responded, "Too backward, learn from China"
"Haha, we are still in the cycle of historical dynasties"
"I don't even know our village chief"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Voting begins in New York and Indiana
At 6am EST, 11am GMT, more and more states are opening polls.
Connecticut, Indiana, Kentucky, Maine, New Jersey, New York and Virginia are now open for voting.
New York has 28 electoral votes. Maine has only 4.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Polls open in swing state North Carolina; 11 states have begun voting
With polls opening in Ohio, West Virginia and North Carolina, it means that there are now 11 states welcoming voters to vote.
North Carolina is the first swing state to open its polls today.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 5, CCTV News reported that Japan's Defense Minister: North Korea launched at least 7 ballistic missiles.
Netizen replied: If Japan is not bullied, it will become strong on its own.
Another netizen replied: Hello everyone, my name is Xiao Xinzheng, 72 years old, a retired soldier with 46 years of party membership. I report the Zhumadian judge's unjust judgment and wrongful conviction against me for nearly 10 years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: November 4 (Released) In view of the North Korean People’s Army’s desire for food, the Ukrainian army developed a food bait bomb and dropped it on Russian positions using manned aircraft.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In addition to the presidential election, the United States also voted on the following today:
1: Abortion rights: Including the two battleground states of Arizona and Nevada, 10 states will vote on how to regulate abortion
2: One-third of the seats in the U.S. Senate: 34 of the 100 seats in the Senate will be re-elected; the Democratic Party currently controls the Senate with a one-seat advantage
3:
